alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Aroostook County through 415 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Madawaska Lake, or 15 miles northwest of Caribou, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Caribou, Fort Fairfield, Limestone, Woodland, Madawaska Lake, New Sweden, Connor, Perham, Caswell, Stockholm, Hamlin, Westmanland and Cyr Plantation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
